attributes.action: Allow Scotland to view the result of the secret independence poll.
attributes.background: The government do not want the people of Scotland to know the result of the latest independence poll and want to keep them in the dark. The people of Scotland should know what the latest poll says.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to make a freedom of information request here: 

https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request
